name: Dodge N' Run
description:
The goal of the game is to avoid the red triangles to cause how much time you avoided the red triangles if you touch a red triangle, then it shows a game over screen and also how much time you avoided the red triangles, in able to get a high amount of time. You have to avoid the red triangles.

------- Controls -------

Press ◄ to move left

Press ▼ to move down

Press ▲ to move up

Press ► to move right
